mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (user_id, menu_id, tab_code, title, summary, content, tags, views, likes, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{menuId}, #{tabCode}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{tags}, 0, 0, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, menu_id, tab_code, title, summary, content, tags, views, likes, create_time, update_time FROM article ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT id, user_id, menu_id, tab_code, title, summary, content, tags, views, likes, create_time, update_time FROM article WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content}, tags = #{tags}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, menu_id, tab_code, title, summary, content, tags, views, likes, create_time, update_time FROM article WHERE (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
